channel.title: Comments on: Sex Pistols to reunite: more flogging of the same dead horse

item.title: By: patrick
item.dc:creator: patrick
item.description: no diggity, mr. young. no doubt.

item.title: By: Logan Young
item.dc:creator: Logan Young
item.description: you know me too well mr. wall. of course i would, but even i would have to bag it up like blackstreet beforehand.
item.content:encoded: you know me too well mr. wall. of course i would, but even i would have to bag it up like blackstreet beforehand.

item.title: By: patrick
item.dc:creator: patrick
item.description: in short: logan would hit it.

item.title: By: Logan Young
item.dc:creator: Logan Young
item.description: glad to know i could be of service to you both. she's so honest and forthright, almost makes me wanna take her home to mama.
item.content:encoded: glad to know i could be of service to you both. she’s so honest and forthright, almost makes me wanna take her home to mama.

item.title: By: patrick
item.dc:creator: patrick
item.description: man ... amy winehouse is a classy dame, ain't she.
item.content:encoded: man … amy winehouse is a classy dame, ain’t she.

item.title: By: patrick
item.dc:creator: patrick
item.description:
"i'd rather have cat AIDS."
holy fuck. i almost spit my coffee.
item.content:encoded:
“i’d rather have cat AIDS.”

holy fuck. i almost spit my coffee.

item.title: By: K
item.dc:creator: K
item.description: Logan, that was gold. Made my morning.
item.content:encoded: Logan, that was gold. Made my morning.
